articles.title: White House restores legal status of child with life-threatening illness
articles.description: After national outcry, Trump officials reverses decision to end humanitarian parole for four-year-old and family
articles.content:
The Trump administration has reversed its decision to revoke the legal status of a four-year-old girl, receiving ongoing life-saving treatment in the US, and her family after a national outcry.

articles.title: ‘They are in shock’: Indian students fear Trump has ended their American dream
articles.description: Those hoping to study in US are in limbo or looking elsewhere after president’s targeting of foreign students
articles.content:

articles.title: Maniac busted after jumping Mar-a-Lago wall, telling cops he wanted to 'marry' Trump's teen granddaughter Kai
articles.description: Anthony Thomas Reyes was busted just after midnight and confessed to arresting officers that he had scaled the wall surrounding the Palm Beach, Fla. property.
articles.content:
